column4: Sorry to interrupt...  Anyone out there got a Novatel (Verizon) V640 working in Ubuntu?  I have a Dell Mini-9 and USB adapter & can't get it to work.  Thanks!
No.  Tried command line and Gnome.  Power turns light green but that is all.
what does dmesg say if you plug it in? (use http://paste.ubuntu.com if the output is large)
I've sent you a private message
